ANNEXURE V THE TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT FILED BY THE POLICE BEFORE THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-II, KASARAGOD, IN C.C.NO.944/17 IN RESPECT OF CRIME 140/2017. ANNEXURE VI. THE TRUE COPY OF THE FIRST INFORMATION REPORT IN CRIME 326/17. ANNEXURE Vil THE TRUE COPY OF THE ORDER IN BA 4930/2017. RESPONDENT(S)' ANNEXURES- NIL [TRUE COPY/ PS TO JUDGE TS 2017/KER/49768 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 8" day of December, 2017 ORDER On the basis of Annexure-lll report filed by the Sub Inspector of Police, Badiadka Police Station, proceedings under Section 107 Cr.P.C. have been initiated against the petitioners. The report shows that the petitioners are two among the accused in two crimes. One crime is Crime No.140/2017 of Badiadka Police Station for the offences under Sections 143, 147, 341, 323 and 506(i) read with Section 149 IPC and the other crime is Crime No.326/2017 of Badiadka Police Station for the offences under Sections 341 and 323 read with Section 34 IPC. Apart from these two crimes, no other crimes have been registered against the petitioners. 2. Based on the aforesaid aspects alone, the Beal aa 2017/KER/49768 Crl.M.C.7086/2017 :2: petitioners cannot be trapped in proceedings under Section 107 Cr.P.C. Matters being so, Annexure-l order is liable to be quashed. In the result, this Cri.M.C. is allowed and Annexure-] order is quashed. Sd/- (B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE) aks/08/12 // True Copy // PS to Judge
